data.md:MetaData: (Table 1) Position of ash +19 and -17 in DSDP Site 80-550 with respect to magnetochron C24r and the onset of the Paleocene - Eocene Thermal Maximum (PETM)
43 cores, 400 m cored, 23.5 m drilled, 63.1 % recovery
Latest on the absolute age of the Paleocene - Eocene Thermal Maximum (PETM): New insights from exact stratigraphic position of key ash layers +19 and -17
